subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Stanislas Wawrinka captured his first major title at the Australian Open, defeating Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal along the way. But his victory wasn’t enough to crack the Big Four.
snippet: Stanislas Wawrinka captured his first major title at the Australian Open, defeating Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal along the way. But his victory wasn’t enough to crack the Big Four.
